text: @NikkiHaley Not as many as could be helped with the 500 billion. You  just resigned from Boeing's board. Did you advise or remind them that they were failing before the coronavirus due to their plane crashes? Tell them that they don't deserve a bailout of taxpayer's money. FRAUD!!
